hero.subtitle: A Self-Actualization & Persuasion Specialist with a medical background and an MBA in progress. For over six years, I've combined behavioral consulting, sales mastery, and medical education to help professionals understand themselves and others — and use that insight to grow, lead, and influence.

about.overviewText: As a Birkman Certified Consultant, I don't just teach communication or leadership; I guide you to discover your deeper motivations, stress patterns, and strengths. My passion lies in transforming non-financial relationships into valuable, measurable assets, and in building content and training programs that inspire curiosity, self-awareness, and real-world results. Whether I'm training, mentoring a medical student, or designing a personal growth workshop — my method is always the same: start with why, explore how, and deliver value.

contact.success: Thank you. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.error: Ahh, something went wrong. Please try again.
contact.readyToStart: Ready to start your journey? Send me a message!

birkman.doerDesc: RED is the Birkman color for people who prefer to make quick decisions and get results. Reds are direct and action-oriented and give full attention to the task at hand. Reds enjoy building, working with their hands, organizing people and projects, solving practical problems, and producing an end product they can see and feel. Reds are objective, energetic, commanding and enjoy team competition. Reds get results through action.
birkman.communicatorDesc: GREEN is the Birkman color for people with a strong desire to communicate and work with people. Every time you see a Green, they are selling, persuading, promoting, motivating, counseling, teaching, or working with people to get results. Greens who believe in a product, service or idea can communicate about it with ease and a natural confidence. If you want someone to win friends and influence people, a Green is your person for the job.
birkman.analyzerDesc: YELLOW is the Birkman color for people who love working with processes, details, definitions and rules. Yellows enjoy doing careful and detailed calculations, scheduling, record-keeping, and establishing systematic procedures. They are usually comfortable with numbers, place a high priority on being fair, and are cautious and thorough in analysis. Yellows are task-oriented and often prefer indirect communication methods including forms, rules and regulations. If you need to get organized, find a Yellow.
birkman.thinkerDesc: BLUE is the Birkman color for the concept and idea person. Blues love innovation, being creative and long-term planning. They enjoy abstract thinking and discovering new ways to solve problems. Blues thrive on generating fresh ideas and coming up with the most viable solutions for the problem at hand. Blues tend to be introspective, and while they love originality and innovation, they may need to be around other creative individuals to trigger the spark.
birkman.assessmentDesc: Unlock insights across all these areas with a single comprehensive assessment
birkman.whatIsDesc: The Birkman Method is a personality and behavioral assessment tool used to help individuals understand themselves and others better, especially in professional or team settings.
birkman.feelingTitle: Feeling Lost or Confused?
birkman.feelingDesc: Don't know if you're in the right place? What are your strengths and how can you leverage them? What's the best work environment and learning style for you?

birkman.tapToLearn: Tap any quadrant to learn about that personality type
birkman.readyToDiscoverColor: Ready to Discover Your Color?
birkman.cardDoerDesc: Red is the Birkman color for people who prefer to make quick decisions and achieve results. They are characterized by clarity and a focus on getting things done. They enjoy building, hands-on work, organizing people and projects, and solving practical problems. They are objective, energetic, and enjoy group competition.
birkman.cardCommunicatorDesc: The Birkman green color represents people who have a strong desire to communicate and work with others. You'll always find them selling, persuading, promoting, motivating, directing, teaching, or collaborating with people to achieve results. If you need someone who makes friends and influences people, green is the right person.
birkman.cardAnalyzerDesc: Yellow is the Birkman color for people who enjoy working with processes, details, definitions, and rules. They take pleasure in precise calculations, scheduling, record-keeping, and establishing systematic procedures. They prefer organization and thorough analysis.
birkman.cardThinkerDesc: Blue is the Birkman color for creative and idea-driven individuals. They enjoy innovation, long-term planning, abstract thinking, and discovering new solutions to problems. They thrive on generating new ideas and sometimes need to be around other creatives to spark inspiration.
birkman.testimonialsDesc: Discover what our clients say about their Birkman Assessment experience

interview.heroTitle: Master Your Next Interview With Confidence
interview.heroDesc: Personalized mock interviews and expert guidance to help you prepare, impress, and land your dream job. Practice with a professional and get detailed feedback tailored to your career goals.
interview.mockDesc: Practice in realistic interview environments with our professional setup. Get comfortable with different interview scenarios and receive instant feedback.
interview.chair1Desc: Practice in a safe environment where mistakes become learning opportunities, not career setbacks.
interview.chair2Desc: Get detailed analytics on your responses, body language, and communication skills with scoring breakdowns.
interview.chair3Desc: Receive personalized insights and actionable tips from AI coaches to improve your interview technique.
